functional_units.name: dinf/dref Data Reference Parser
functional_units.description: Parses data reference boxes to emit entry type, version/flags, and URL/URN payload metadata for downstream chunk lookup tracking.

functional_units.name: smhd/vmhd Media Header Surface
functional_units.description: Exposes media header fields (balance, graphics mode, opcolor) via BoxParserRegistry and updates JSON exports.

functional_units.name: edts/elst Edit List Decoder
functional_units.description: Decodes edit lists including segment duration, media time, and rate, and extends validation hooks to reconcile timeline adjustments with movie and track durations.

functional_units.name: udta/meta/keys/ilst Metadata Parser
functional_units.description: Parses baseline metadata boxes (udta, meta handler, keys, ilst) surfacing simple string/integer payloads for CLI export while maintaining handler mappings.
